File libsrc/libcssio/CheckWfdisc.c

Public Functions

cssioCheckWfdisc 
 int cssioCheckWfdisc(WFDISC30 *wf,
                      const char *wdir)
Check the nsamp, samprate and endtime values in a wfdisc. If the nsamp value is <= 0, compute it from the datatype, samprate and dotw file size. Check for samprate > 0 and compute the endtime.

Parameters:
wf - Input wfdisc structure to check.
wdir - The working directory.
Returns:
0 for success, nonzero for error. Use cssioGetErrorMsg.
